geonetwork-customCriteriaHelp: Define whatever criteria are supported by the remote node and not available in the predefined filters (eg. 'similarity' set to '1' for non fuzzy search). You may specify multiple criteria separated by ';' (eg. _schema;siteId with values iso19139;7fc45be3-9aba-4198-920c-b8737112d522)
rebuildIndexHelp: While rebuilding index, the search may return incomplete results and the CSW GetRecords operation is disabled. Use this function when catalog traffic is low. It's recommended to rebuild the index after reloading the index configuration or making changes directly in the database.
system/csw/metadataPublic-help: When a transaction inserts a new record via the CSW-T protocol, automatically publish the record to all users.
system/csw/transactionUpdateCreateXPath: Create element if it does not exist when using XPath in CSW transaction.
system/metadatacreate/generateUuid-help: GeoNetwork assigns a random metadata UUID to the metadata created by a user (default). To assign the metadata UUID manually disable this option and fill the metadata UUID prefix.
workspace-help: Namespace prefix and namespace URL corresponding to the workspace data has to be published in.
passwordMinlength: Password must contain at least 8 characters!
editorBoardInfo: Create or import new records from this page. Quickly access and manage all metadata records.
searchOver: Welcome to the Defra Metadata Catalogue. You can explore the data by keyword, INSPIRE theme, topic, organisation etc. For more information, email us at metadata@environment-agency.gov.uk
indexRecordsWithErrors: Try to index records with errors
_to_eamp: Correct EAMP namespaces and standard name/version
sessionIsAboutToBeCancelled: Your Metadata Catalogue session will shortly expire due to inactivity.
sessionWillExpireIn: Your Metadata Catalogue session will expire in {{remainingTime}}s. Please save your work.
sessionIsProbablyCancelled: Your Metadata Catalogue session will shortly expire due to inactivity. Please refresh your browser session and login again.
sessionAlertDisconnectedMsg: Your Metadata Catalogue session has expired due to inactivity. Please refresh your browser session and login again
indexInEsDoneError: There is an error with the ElasticSearch index. See the logs for details
passwordPattern: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 numeric character. Sequences of 3 or more identical or ascending characters such as 111,123,abc,aaa are not allowed.
system/security/passwordEnforcement/useP: Require that the password restriction rules are applied
addXpath-help: Updating records using XPath needs careful definition of the changes. A change is defined by:
addXpathXpath: a mandatory XPath to point to the element(s) to update. XPath can not contain a filter expression.
esriRestLinkDetails: Spatial data download link: {{url}}.
